articles.description: An old clip of Lorraine joking about Caroline Flack losing her job as Love Island host was played in Wednesday's documentary
articles.content:
Caroline Flack's mum was left appalled by Lorraine Kelly's dig at the late TV star after she stood down as Love Island host.
Caroline, 40, left her dream job as presenter of the ITV2 show after bein… [+1832 chars]
